Function reference

Poisson

Poisson distribution

dpois
Poisson Probability Mass Function
qpois
Poisson Quantile Function
poisson_lpmf_stan
Poisson Log Probability Mass Function Stan Code

Zero-inflated Poisson

Zero-inflated Poisson distribution

dzip()
Zero-inflated Poisson Probability Mass Function
qzip()
Zero-inflated Poisson Quantile Function
zi_poisson_lpmf_stan
Zero-inflated Poisson Log Probability Mass Function Stan Code

Zero-inflated Poisson Linked

Zero-inflated Poisson (with linked mean and zero-inflation) distribution

dzipl()
Zero-inflated Poisson Linked Probability Mass Function
qzipl()
Zero-inflated Poisson Linked Quantile Function
zi_poisson_linked_lpmf_stan
Zero-inflated Poisson Linked Log Probability Mass Function Stan Code

Zero-inflated Poisson Log-linked

Zero-inflated Poisson (with log-linked mean and zero-inflation) distribution

dzipll()
Zero-inflated Poisson Linked Probability Mass Function
qzipll()
Zero-inflated Poisson Linked Quantile Function
zi_poisson_log_linked_lpmf_stan
Zero-inflated Poisson Linked Log Probability Mass Function Stan Code

Negative-binomial

Negative-binomial distribution

dneg_binomial_2()
The Negative Binomial Probability Mass Function (alternative parameterisation)
qneg_binomial_2()
The Negative Binomial Quantile Function (alternative parameterisation)
neg_binomial_2_lpmf_stan
Negative Binomial Log Probability Mass Function Stan Code

Zero-inflated Negative-binomial

Zero-inflated negative-binomial distribution

dzinb_2()
Zero-inflated Negative Binomial Probability Mass
qzinb_2()
Zero-inflated Negative Binomial Quantile Function
zi_neg_binomial_2_lpmf_stan
Zero-inflated Negative-binomial Log Probability Mass Function Stan Code

Zero-inflated Negative-binomial Linked

Zero-inflated negative-binomial (with linked mean and zero-inflation) distribution

dzinbl_2()
Zero-inflated Negative Binomial Linked Probability Mass
qzinbl_2()
Zero-inflated Negative Linked Binomial Quantile Function
zi_neg_binomial_linked_2_lpmf_stan
Zero-inflated Negative-binomial Linked Log Probability Mass Function Stan Code

Zero-inflated Negative-binomial Log-linked

Zero-inflated negative-binomial (with log-linked mean and zero-inflation) distribution

dzinbll_2()
Zero-inflated Negative Binomial Log-linked Probability Mass
qzinbll_2()
Zero-inflated Negative Log-linked Binomial Quantile Function
zi_neg_binomial_log_linked_2_lpmf_stan
Zero-inflated Negative-binomial Log-linked Log Probability Mass Function Stan Code
